comments:
Build: TPTP-4.2.0-200605251528A

Follow the steps *exactly* as outlined below:

- Create a simple project named LogAnalyzerProject
- Select the project and use its context menu to select New > Other > Profiling and Logging > Symptom Database
- Specify sym1 as the name and leave all other options as default.  Click on OK
- Switch to the details page and add a definition followed by a recommendation
- Select the root element of the tree and add another definition
- Click re-use and select recommendation

I didn't get any dialog and I got the following exception in my workspace log file:
